meaningMnemonic: The region of <kanji>darkness</kanji> in days of <kanji>old</kanji> referred to <vocabulary>Mongolia</vocabulary>. At least in China, where this word comes from. Imagine all those ancient Mongol tribes at the dark, unknown edges of China. Everything beyond the borders was shrouded in (figurative) darkness, I guess. No wonder they picked these kanji back then.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
